description: Short-sleeved t-shirt in a sustainable jersey knit that combines the softness of organic cotton with the functionality and durability of recycled polyester. Wicks away moisture and dries quickly, making it extra comfortable in warm climates. Round neckline and “Fikapaus” print on the front – fikapaus is Swedish for coffee break.
name: Fjallraven Fikapaus T-Shirt - Mens
